text: José Augusto da Silva Curvo (27 August 1949 – 20 January 2022), also known as Tampinha, was a Brazilian politician. He was a member of the Social Democracy Party and later the Democratic Labour Party. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1991 to 1995 and again in 2016. She was born in Cuiabá, Brazil. Curvo died on 20 January 2022, at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Brazilian politicians Category:People from Mato Grosso
title: José Augusto Curvo
